messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Ritalin was:TV??
messages.msgSnippet: -=- woohoo! oh, and don t you just LOVE the teachers and school administration who think they can diagnose our children!-=- The teachers can do it as well as
messages.messageBody:
-=-
woohoo! oh, and don't you just LOVE the teachers and school
administration
who think they can diagnose our children!-=-

The teachers can do it as well as the doctors, seeing as how there's
no such "disease."

LOTS of people are that way.
School doesn't LIKE people who are that way (unless they can be
charming and make A's, as did moi and many others).

So if school is the priority and children are expendable and TV can
be blamed...
There it is!

Sandra

pharmaceutical companies who supply Ritalin.~~

woohoo! oh, and don't you just LOVE the teachers and school administration
who think they can diagnose our children! (serenity now! serenity now!
lol... taking a breather before I get really mad thinking about this whole
thing!)

Lesa
